HANDOFF CAPSULE - Context for next session:

## What was done this session
- Launched 4 parallel SWE agents across worktrees, merged all branches to main
- Fixed foolery-d45 (column reorder: priority before type/status) - DONE
- Fixed foolery-d0l (reject button: --set-labels "" was no-op, switched to --remove-label via new removeLabels field in schema/bd.ts) - DONE, in stage:verification
- Added removeLabels support: schemas.ts, bd.ts, bead-columns.tsx all updated
- Currently mid-fix on foolery-79u (bead detail editing) - file was just rewritten but NOT yet committed or build-tested

## foolery-79u changes just made (uncommitted in bead-detail.tsx):
1. Select dropdowns (type/status/priority): Changed onValueChange from returning Promise to fire-and-forget via new `fireUpdate()` helper that calls onUpdate().catch(). Changed SelectTrigger from h-7 to h-auto and added cursor-pointer.
2. Labels: Replaced click-to-edit-all with individual X buttons per label using removeLabels API + an "+ Add" button with inline input for new labels
3. Added savingRef to prevent double-saves on blur
4. saveEdit state reset moved to finally{} block

## Remaining open P0 beads:
- foolery-79u: bead detail editing - changes written but need build test + verify
- foolery-3of: condense padding everywhere (50% on /beads, 75% on detail)
- foolery-ojo: logo PNG corners not cleaned up (only CSS rounded was added)
- foolery-6p6: hierarchy view doesn't work - bd list --json doesn't return parent field, only bd show does. Need different approach (maybe use dependencies or fetch parent per-bead)
- foolery-d0l: in stage:verification, test reject button
- foolery-d45: in stage:verification, test column order

## Key technical findings:
- bd CLI: --set-labels "" is a NO-OP (doesn't clear labels). Must use --remove-label instead.
- bd list --json does NOT return parent field. bd show --json does. Hierarchy needs a different data source.
- bd update accepts: --title, --description, --acceptance, --notes, --type, --status, --priority, --set-labels, --remove-label, --add-label
- All worktrees cleaned up, branches deleted, code is on main
